title: Mother
description: Academy Award nominated musical based on the story of Mother Teresa.
quote: Food! I love food and I’m really in the mood for a big corn dog or pu pu platter, two Ding Dongs, it doesn’t matter!
altHero: Mother Teresa, gleeful with arms raised, runs through a village with hungry children holding out empty bowls
alt1: Mother Teresa dancing near the hungry children
alt2: Mother Teresa grabs a small boy’s crutch
alt3: the small boy falls to the ground
alt4: Mother Teresa dancing and running with the crutch, a hungry child behind her
